description: Detect execution of suspicious double extension files in ParentCommandLine
author: frack113
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious Parent Double Extension File Execution
query: ((process.parent.executable.text:("*.doc.lnk" OR "*.docx.lnk" OR "*.xls.lnk" OR "*.xlsx.lnk" OR "*.ppt.lnk" OR "*.pptx.lnk" OR "*.rtf.lnk" OR "*.pdf.lnk" OR "*.txt.lnk" OR "*.doc.js" OR "*.docx.js" OR "*.xls.js" OR "*.xlsx.js" OR "*.ppt.js" OR "*.pptx.js" OR "*.rtf.js" OR "*.pdf.js" OR "*.txt.js")) OR (process.parent.command_line.text:("*.doc.lnk*" OR "*.docx.lnk*" OR "*.xls.lnk*" OR "*.xlsx.lnk*" OR "*.ppt.lnk*" OR "*.pptx.lnk*" OR "*.rtf.lnk*" OR "*.pdf.lnk*" OR "*.txt.lnk*" OR "*.doc.js*" OR "*.docx.js*" OR "*.xls.js*" OR "*.xlsx.js*" OR "*.ppt.js*" OR "*.pptx.js*" OR "*.rtf.js*" OR "*.pdf.js*" OR "*.txt.js*")))
